trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_SEQ_00<tab>Eilis bears grim work for an accomplished adventurer.
TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_SEQ_01<tab>Eilis informs you that the Sahagin are looking to launch an attack on Tidegate. Slay four of the creatures that prowl near by way of discouragement.
TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_SEQ_02<tab>Inform Eilis that you have delayed the advance of the Sahagin front line.
TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_SEQ_03<tab>Eilis will rest easier knowing you have kept her nightmare at bay.
TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_EILIS_000_000<tab>Beyond Tidegate lies the Sahagin Landbase, whence the fishbacks mean to launch an attack.

TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_EILIS_000_001<tab>Though we cannot forestall their advance, we might give them pause with a sudden strike. I'll need you to make four Sahagin serve as a cautionary tale for the rest.
TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_EILIS_000_020<tab>A job well done! Let us see how the fishbacks fancy that!

TEXT_GAIUSC806_01030_EILIS_000_021<tab>Each day, the hordes of slimy Sahagin soldiers threaten to take our beloved gates. I pray the day never comes, but prayer alone will not suffice. Thanks to you, today will not be that day.
